Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Deficit = TDEE - Energy Consumed   TDEE is equal to your BMR multiplied by a factor to account for your activity level. There are many calculators online to estimate BMR and TDEE. (And BMR is basically the energy your body would use if you were catatonic, so basing deficit estimates off TDEE is what makes sense.) All the numbers are approximate of course, which can be frustrating but it gets things in the ballpark.
